nodes.text: An Ewok Adventure is a comic strip/coloring book published by Golden Books in 1997. It adapts the scene from Return of the Jedi of the Endor strike team's capture by the Ewoks during the Battle of Endor. The book was penciled and inked by artist Guy Dorian.
In 2012, the comic was reprinted in Star Wars Omnibus: Droids and Ewoks.
